backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user registration with role-based access control (student/industryPartner/admin), user profile management, project CRUD operations, contact requests, and platform metrics tracking using Map-based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting text color updates from black to white across LandingPage, StudentDashboard, IndustryDashboard, and AdminDashboard components for dark background visibility.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration files with descriptions of their functionality and recent white text theme updates.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark modes with professional dark blue theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with title 'Bharat Silicon Setu' and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for landing, student/industry/admin dashboards, AI skill mapping, protected routes, and role selection modal with QueryClient provider.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that verifies authentication and role-based access, redirecting unauthenticated users to landing page and users with incorrect roles to their appropriate dashboard.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelectionMod: Modal dialog for first-time user role selection (student/industryPartner/admin) with large card-based UI, gradient icons, registration handling, and automatic navigation to role-specific dashboard.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and initializing access control with an admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactRequests.ts: Provides hooks for fetching contact requests and sending new contact requests to other users via the backend actor, with automatic query invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication state with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlatformMetrics.ts: Fetches platform-wide metrics (total users and projects) from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjects.ts: Provides hooks for fetching approved projects, user-specific projects, and saving projects with automatic cache invalidation.
Fetches the current user's role and provides the appropriate dashboard path based on role (student, industry partner, or admin).
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches the current user's profile from the backend actor with loading and error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including primary, secondary, accent, and sidebar color schemes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page with sidebar navigation showing platform metrics (total users and projects) and sections for managing users, projects, and activity.
frontend/src/pages/AISkillMapping.tsx: Displays an AI-powered resume analysis page where users can upload resumes to analyze semiconductor skills and view matching project recommendations with skill strength indicators.
frontend/src/pages/IndustryDashboard.tsx: Industry dashboard page with sidebar navigation, project creation dialog, and tabs for managing projects, applicants, and analytics. Includes logout functionality and displays project cards with skills and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, stakeholder information, and Internet Identity login integration. Features responsive header, role-based navigation to dashboards, and sections for how it works, impact, and AI skill mapping.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Student dashboard with sidebar navigation showing profile completion, available projects, and messages. Displays mock skills, project cards with apply functionality, and tabs for overview, projects, and messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing. Includes sessionStorage persistence helpers and functions to clear sensitive parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme with custom fonts (Inter, Space Grotesk), animations, and shadcn/ui component styling including sidebar, chart, and card variants.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for Bharat Silicon Setu, a semiconductor execution ecosystem SaaS platform with multi-stakeholder dashboards (students, industry, startups, institutions). Currently has a known issue with dashboard redirect navigation not working from the landing page.
